attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reason I've been told that schools close in bad weather is when a few teachers can't get in they can't meet the pupil to teacher class size ratio. This should not allowed to be an excuse to close the whole school. At worst a specific class should be sent home.  Really there should be a tempory relaxation to allow pupils to be shared between the classes that are there.

rejection.details: Please ammend the main sentence to a clear action for HM Governement. It currently says "Bill Williams".
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
